user_question: How can blockchain technology be used to improve supply chain transparency, and generate an image of a futuristic supply chain network?
final_answer: Blockchain technology can improve supply chain transparency by providing an immutable ledger of transactions, enhancing traceability, and reducing fraud. Image of a futuristic supply chain network generated. Blockchain can also help reduce counterfeit products by ensuring product authenticity through verified transactions and traceable origins.
